svg.title: Mintos
svg.desc: We provide retail investors with an easy and transparent way to invest in loans originated by a variety of alternative lending companies around the world. Since launching in 2015, Mintos has demonstrated exponential growth and has become the world's largest marketplace of its kind. To date we have raised EUR 7 million in funding to facilitate our growth. Mintos is an ethical company with social and sustainability responsibility practices in place.
